languages.text: Поднявшись на капитанский мостик впервые во время варп-перехода, Лорд-капитан обнаружил{mf||а} дежурных офицеров в состоянии крайнего замешательства. С их слов, с мостика несколько минут поступали команды, авторизованные Вольным Торговцем — хотя Лорд-капитана в этот момент на месте не было! Одна деталь особенно привлекала внимание — приказы были подписаны почившей Теодорой фон Валанциус. После детального расследования техножрецы решили списать странное происшествие на проявление капризов машинных духов.

traits.locale_text: Поднявшись на капитанский мостик впервые во время варп-перехода, Лорд-капитан обнаружил{mf||а} дежурных офицеров в состоянии крайнего замешательства. С их слов, с мостика несколько минут поступали команды, авторизованные Вольным Торговцем — хотя Лорд-капитана в этот момент на месте не было! Одна деталь особенно привлекала внимание — приказы были подписаны почившей Теодорой фон Валанциус. После детального расследования техножрецы решили списать странное происшествие на проявление капризов машинных духов.

languages.text: When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorised by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.
languages.original_text: Поднявшись на капитанский мостик впервые во время варп-перехода, Лорд-капитан обнаружил{mf||а} дежурных офицеров в состоянии крайнего замешательства. С их слов, с мостика несколько минут поступали команды, авторизованные Вольным Торговцем — хотя Лорд-капитана в этот момент на месте не было! Одна деталь особенно привлекала внимание — приказы были подписаны почившей Теодорой фон Валанциус. После детального расследования техножрецы решили списать странное происшествие на проявление капризов машинных духов.

traits.locale_text: Upon their first arrival on the bridge during warp travel, Lord-captain encountered utter confusion among attending officers. Apparently they had been receiving orders authorized by the Rogue Trader from the bridge, even though the captain was not there. Curiously, they were signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. The Tech Priests attributed the strange incident to machine spirits' whims.

Upon their first arrival on the bridge during warp travel, Lord-captain encountered utter confusion among attending officers. Apparently they had been receiving orders authorized by the Rogue Trader from the bridge, even though the captain was not there. Curiously, they were signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. The Tech Priests attributed the strange incident to machine spirits' whims.

Upon their first arrival on the bridge during warp travel, the Lord Captain encountered utter confusion among attending officers. Apparently, they had been receiving orders authorized by the Rogue Trader from the bridge, even though the Lord Captain was not there. Curiously, they were signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. The Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of machine spirits.

Upon their first arrival on the bridge during warp travel, the Lord Captain encountered utter confusion among attending officers. Apparently, they had been receiving orders authorized by the Rogue Trader from the bridge, even though the Lord Captain was not there. Curiously, they were signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. The Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of machine spirits.

When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorized by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.

When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorised by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.

languages.text: 当舰长大人在亚空间跳跃的过程中抵达舰桥时，{mf|他|她}发现全体值班军官都处于一团混乱之中。军官们声称，在之前的几分钟内，舰桥一直都在收到各种各样的命令。这些命令得到了行商浪人的授权，但舰长大人那个时候根本就不在舰桥上。更古怪的是，这些命令是由已故的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯签署的。经过彻底调查之后，技术神甫们将这一古怪的事件归结为机魂心血来潮的恶作剧。
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorised by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: 当舰长大人在亚空间跳跃的过程中抵达舰桥时，{mf|他|她}发现全体值班军官都处于一团混乱之中。军官们声称，在之前的几分钟内，舰桥一直都在收到各种各样的命令。这些命令得到了行商浪人的授权，但舰长大人那个时候根本就不在舰桥上。更古怪的是，这些命令是由已故的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯签署的。经过彻底调查之后，技术祭司们将这一古怪的事件归结为机魂心血来潮的恶作剧。

languages.text: Cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán llegó al puente durante el salto de disformidad, encontró a los oficiales sumidos en la más absoluta confusión. Afirmaban haber recibido órdenes del puente durante varios minutos autorizadas por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no había estado presente. Curiosamente, quien firmaba las órdenes era la difunta Theodora von Valancius. Tras una investigación concienzuda, los tecnosacerdotes atribuyeron la incidencia a los caprichos de algún espíritu máquina.
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorised by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: Cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán llegó al puente durante el salto de disformidad, encontró a los oficiales sumidos en la más absoluta confusión. Afirmaban haber recibido órdenes del puente durante varios minutos autorizadas por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no había estado presente. Curiosamente, quien firmaba las órdenes era la difunta Theodora von Valancius. Tras una investigación concienzuda, los tecnosacerdotes atribuyeron la incidencia a los caprichos de algún espíritu máquina.

languages.text: ワープジャンプ中にロード・キャプテンが艦橋に到着したところ、非常にうろたえた当直士官たちを見つけた。士官は艦橋からの命令を数分間にわたり受け取っていた。その命令はロード・キャプテンに許可されたものだったという――しかしロード・キャプテンは不在だった。奇妙なことに、命令には故テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスのサインがあった。徹底した調査の結果、この奇妙な事件は機械精霊（マシーンスピリット）の気まぐれであると、技術司祭（テックプリースト）は結論付けた。
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorised by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: ワープジャンプ中にロード・キャプテンが艦橋に到着したところ、非常にうろたえた当直士官たちを見つけた。士官は艦橋からの命令を数分間にわたり受け取っていた。その命令はロード・キャプテンに許可されたものだったという――しかしロード・キャプテンは不在だった。奇妙なことに、命令には故テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスのサインがあった。徹底した調査の結果、この奇妙な事件は機械精霊（マシーンスピリット）の気まぐれであると、技術司祭（テックプリースト）は結論付けた。

languages.text: Als der Lord Captain während des Warpsprungs auf die Brücke kam, fand er die diensthabenden Offiziere in einem Zustand völliger Verwirrung vor. Sie behaupteten, mehrere Minuten lang Befehle von der Brücke erhalten zu haben, Befehle, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} autorisiert hatte — doch der Lord Captain war überhaupt gar nicht auf der Brücke gewesen. Merkwürdigerweise waren die Befehle von der verstorbenen Theodora von Valancius unterzeichnet. Nach einer gründlichen Untersuchung schrieben die Techpriester den sonderbaren Vorfall den Launen der Maschinengeister zu.
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorised by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: Als der Lord Captain während des Warpsprungs auf die Brücke kam, fand er die diensthabenden Offiziere in einem Zustand völliger Verwirrung vor. Sie behaupteten, mehrere Minuten lang Befehle von der Brücke erhalten zu haben, Befehle, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} autorisiert hatte — doch der Lord Captain war überhaupt gar nicht auf der Brücke gewesen. Merkwürdigerweise waren die Befehle von der verstorbenen Theodora von Valancius unterzeichnet. Nach einer gründlichen Untersuchung schrieben die Techpriester den sonderbaren Vorfall den Launen der Maschinengeister zu.

languages.text: Lorsque {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} arriva sur le pont au moment du saut Warp, {mf|il|elle} trouva les officiers en fonction dans un état de confusion profond. Ils affirmèrent avoir reçu des ordres du pont depuis plusieurs minutes, ordres autorisés par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}... alors que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} était {mf|absent|absente}. Bizarrement, les ordres avaient été signés par feu Théodora von Valancius. Après une enquête approfondie, les technoprêtres attribuèrent l'étrange incident aux caprices des esprits de la machine.
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorised by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine arriva sur le pont au moment du saut Warp, {mf|il|elle} trouva les officiers en fonction dans un état de confusion profond. Ils affirmèrent avoir reçu des ordres du pont depuis plusieurs minutes, ordres autorisés par {mf|le|la} libre-marchand... alors que {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine était {mf|absent|absente}. Bizarrement, les ordres avaient été signés par feu Théodora von Valancius. Après une enquête approfondie, les technoprêtres attribuèrent l'étrange incident aux caprices des esprits de la machine.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, öte sıçrama sırasında köprüye geldiğinde görevdeki subayları tam bir kafa karışıklığı içinde buldu. Subaylar; birkaç dakikadır köprüden emir aldıklarını, bu emirlerin Hür Tacir tarafından yetkilendirildiğini söyledi. Ancak Lord Kaptan, o sırada köprüde değildi. Daha da ilginç olanı, emirlerin merhum Theodora von Valancius tarafından imzalanmış olması. Yapılan kapsamlı bir soruşturmanın ardından Tekno Rahipler, bu garip olayı makine ruhlarının kaprislerine bağladı.
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain arrived on the bridge during the warp jump, {mf|he|she} found the on-duty officers in a state of utter confusion. They claimed they had been receiving orders from the bridge for several minutes, orders authorised by the Rogue Trader — but the Lord Captain had been absent. Curiously, the orders had been signed by the late Theodora von Valancius. After a thorough investigation, the Tech-Priests attributed the strange incident to the whims of the machine spirits.
